name: Black Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walking, 60 ft. flying, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Black Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon characterized by its sleek, dark scales that shimmer like the depths of a murky lake. It possesses a pair of powerful wings and a long, sinuous tail, making it agile both in the air and underwater.
memorable: This wyrmling's signature Acid Breath attack can devastate multiple foes at once, and its ability to stealthily strike from submerged positions makes it a fearsome adversary.
goals: To dominate its territory and hunt down weaker creatures, utilizing its stealth and aquatic abilities to ambush prey.
relations: May be found serving under more powerful black dragons or allied with other aquatic creatures in its habitat.
environment: Typically inhabits dark, swampy areas or murky waters.
strengths: Resilient due to acid immunity, excellent mobility with the ability to fly and swim, and strong stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Limited intelligence and lack of versatility compared to older dragons.
attacks: Can utilize a Bite attack that deals piercing damage, as well as a powerful Acid Breath that inflicts significant area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Breath, an area-of-effect attack that deals heavy acid damage and can affect multiple targets.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate and strike in darkness.
skills: Excels in Stealth, allowing it to move silently and surprise opponents.
additional_information: Amphibious, allowing it to breathe in both air and water.
Can ambush successfully when submerged due to advantage on Stealth checks.
Has a Pounce ability that can knock targets prone for increased combat advantage.
Flies at a speed of 60 ft., providing excellent maneuverability in combat.
Highly effective in aquatic settings, combining mobility and stealth.
